mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, AUTHORITY, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL=#{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress}, #{profileImg}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberMajor}, #{memberIntroduce}, #{memberName} )
mapper.select: SELECT STUDY_NO , MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN STUDY_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}
